availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: M. B. Morton (Russellville, Kentucky, farmer and cashier)

body.p: Russellville, Kentucky, farmer and cashier. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Morton and Elizabeth Morton. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Cashier for Southern Bank of Kentucky in Russellville c1854 to c1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 102.
J. Smith Homans, ed., The Bankers' Magazine, and Statistical Register, vol. 9 pt. 1 (New York: J. Smith Homans, 1854), 139.
KYR-0001-019-0091.
